metadata.title: CVE-2019-3859 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds read flaw was discovered in libssh2 before 1.8.1 in the_libssh2_packet_require and _libssh2_packet_requirev functions. A remoteattacker who compromises a SSH server may be able to cause a Denial ofService or read data in the client memory.

criterions.comment: libssh2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
